Name: GHOSTWINTER
About the game: You are in The Ghost suit. Welcome to The Virtual world - little village in Siberia, Russia. Try to complete Single game hardcore mission - it's not so easy, but the atmosphere... Winter landscape is beautiful and magic! Play Multiplayer DM/TDM/GG Matches and ranking UP! Have fun! GHOSTWINTER IS: Realistic graphics, cut scenes, atmospheric sound design Single game hardcore mission (shooter, elements of stealth, search, horror) Multiplayer with real players and bots online/offline in three modes - Deathmatch/Team Deathmatch/Gun Game Loadout - person/weapon modification (12 models of weapons in the game) Ranks system, personal statistics, friends and other systems.
Meta Title: GHOSTWINTER: Dec 3, 2020, Dimpiks and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on GHOSTWINTER? Check out the release date (Dec 3, 2020), developer insights from Dimpiks, and a complete game summary.
